questions.text: The UEFA Champions League was founded in 1955.
Real Madrid has won the most UEFA Champions League titles.
The UEFA Champions League final is played over two legs.
The away goals rule is applied in the UEFA Champions League.
The UEFA Champions League anthem is based on a piece by Handel.
Barcelona won the UEFA Champions League in the 2018-2019 season.
Cristiano Ronaldo is the all-time top scorer in the UEFA Champions League.
The UEFA Champions League trophy is also known as 'Old Big Ears'.
The UEFA Champions League replaced the European Cup in 1992.
The UEFA Champions League final is traditionally played at Wembley Stadium.
Bayern Munich won the UEFA Champions League in the 2019-2020 season.
The UEFA Champions League group stage consists of 32 teams.
The UEFA Champions League anthem is sung in English.
AC Milan has won more UEFA Champions League titles than Liverpool.
The UEFA Champions League final is the most watched annual sporting event worldwide.
The UEFA Champions League winner automatically qualifies for the next season's competition.
The UEFA Champions League final has never been decided by a penalty shootout.
The UEFA Champions League trophy weighs approximately 7.5 kilograms.
The UEFA Champions League semifinals are played over one leg.
UEFA stands for Union of European Football Associations.
